topic.title: How to start a revolution using INTERNET ?
topic.body:
Hi,,
After the use of social media in 25 Jan in Arabic spring, the governments made a full surveillance in the Internet and made it too hard to contact people and spread ideas of freedom and human rights. But the hope has not gone and there are many ways to overcome this issue and return to the people his choice and decision. What is your opinion ??

1_1PbHPT2BbYmTiM1SP278hAGmR23eJoMwGG.body:
> [iyogo887vyg87oy8](#comment_17_1H5UJ7LneToGqYqJ9fbLnu1Ko2pxTpchof): Arab spring was caused by CIA not internet lol

Do you have a prove for your claim ?
